clues.text: This D.C. paper led all others in pursuing the story of the Watergate break-in

rounds.comments: (Alex: ...refers to cities in the state of New York.  I'm sure you feel that's obvious.)

clues.text: In a song from "42nd Street" people "shuffled off to" this New York city

At a congress in this city in 1754 Ben Franklin put forth a plan for unity of the colonies

rounds.text: It's the only inhabited U.S. territory south of the equator
